columns.rid: The unique identifier for each route.
columns.dst_apid: The unique identifier for the destination airport.
columns.dst_ap: The code representing the destination airport.
columns.src_apid: The unique identifier for the source airport.
columns.src_ap: The code representing the source airport.
columns.alid: The unique identifier for the airline.
columns.airline: The code representing the airline operating the route.
columns.codeshare: The indication if the route is codeshared with other airlines.

routes.table_description: The table stores flight route details, including source and destination.

columns.apid: The unique identifier for each airport.
columns.name: The official name of the airport.
columns.city: The city where the airport is located.
columns.country: The country where the airport is situated.
columns.x: The geographic x-coordinate of the airport.
columns.y: The geographic y-coordinate of the airport.
columns.elevation: The elevation of the airport above sea level.
columns.iata: The IATA code assigned to the airport.
columns.icao: The ICAO code assigned to the airport.

airports.table_description: The table stores airport details, including location and identifiers.

columns.alid: The unique identifier for each airline.
columns.name: The official name of the airline.
columns.iata: The IATA code assigned to the airline.
columns.icao: The ICAO code assigned to the airline.
columns.callsign: The radio call sign used by the airline.
columns.country: The country where the airline is based.
columns.active: The indication of whether the airline is currently operational.

airlines.table_description: The table stores details about airlines, including identifiers and status.
